Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal

Class ColumnsGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.ColumnsGoal
public class ColumnsGoal extends CommonGoal
This is ColumnsGoal. There are two versions of this goal depending on the value of the second parameter isRegular. If it is true, it gives points to a player if their shelf contains three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types. One column can show the same or a different combination of another column. If it is false, it gives points to a player if their shelf contains two columns each formed by 6 different types of tiles.
